reviews.author: NeilBrown (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer NeilBrown pointed out a potential issue with the removal of ovl_lock_rename_workdir() in patch 12/13, noting that it was removed earlier in a different branch but not yet upstream.

reviews.author: Amir Goldstein
reviews.summary: Reviewer Amir Goldstein raised concerns about the patch to remove ovl_lock_rename_workdir(), questioning its purpose and suggesting it might be unnecessary.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Jeff Layton reviewed the patch series and gave Reviewed-by tags to most patches, but had a minor comment on PATCH 04/13 about returning NULL instead of an error code.
